definition: to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: Union was a tool used by the capitalists in their vain attempt to damp down the labour movement.
sentences.chinese: 那個黃色工會是資本家妄圖用來撲滅工人運動的工具。

sentences.english: The man struck a match to light a cigar.
sentences.chinese: 那人划着了一根火柴撲滅一根香菸。

sentences.english: And if the heart is aflame, no form will quench it.
sentences.chinese: 如果內心在燃燒，則沒有形式可以將其撲滅。

sentences.english: A chemical-free method to treat bed bugs.
sentences.chinese: 一個零化學藥劑的撲滅臭重新方法。

sentences.english: I'd like to be a fireman because I want to put out fires.
sentences.chinese: 我想是一名消防隊員，因爲我想要撲滅火災。

sentences.english: Farmers water plants with it while firemen use it to put out fire.
sentences.chinese: 農民水生植物而消防員用它來撲滅火。

sentences.english: The fire was completely overcome by daybreak.
sentences.chinese: 黎明時大火已被完全撲滅。

sentences.english: One application of key interest is extinguishing cockpit fires, he said.
sentences.chinese: 一個主要的應用是撲滅駕駛艙的火焰，他說。

sentences.english: Lift-up fire engine is an important fire fighting equipment which can eradicate fire from high-rise buildings.
sentences.chinese: 登高消防車是撲滅高層建築火災的重要消防設備。

sentences.english: Superstition set the whole world in flames; philosophy quenches them.
sentences.chinese: 迷信把整個世界推入火海，哲學則撲滅火焰。

sentences.english: They put out the fire by pouring water on it.
sentences.chinese: 他們在火上澆了水，把它撲滅了。

sentences.english: The fire was soon extinguished by the exertions of the soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 因士兵之努力，火災旋即撲滅。

sentences.english: Fight a kidney deficiency through acupressure in this free video by a licensed massage therapist.
sentences.chinese: 撲滅由持牌按摩治療師在此免費視頻通過穴位腎虛。

sentences.english: Apparently, he extinguished exactly 5'10" of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，他正好撲滅了5英尺10英寸的火。

sentences.english: Sometimes it's the smallest flames that spark the biggest fires.
sentences.chinese: 有時候不起眼的小火花能引發難以撲滅的大火災。

sentences.english: At the time, Kinley was the leader in putting out fires in oil wells.
sentences.chinese: 克里在當時在撲滅油井大火方面是一個領導者。

definition: firefighting/to extinguish a fire and save life and property/to dive (of goalkeeper in soccer)
to repair in a rush/rush repairs
